channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Hit List
channel.desc: Marvin and Rochelle Humes host this high-tempo, upbeat music quiz where contestants must name hit songs and artists from every decade and every style of music, as quickly as possible. The teams attempting to win ?10,000 are couple Sam and Priya from Gravesend, colleagues Anthony and Jenna from Belfast, and mum and son Adam and Diane from Southport. Get ready to play along and shout out the answers at the telly!
